verses.name: Luke 6:10
verses.text: And looking round about upon them all, he said unto the man, Stretch forth thy hand. And he did so: and his hand was restored whole as the other.

verses.name: Luke 6:11
verses.text: And they were filled with madness; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus.

verses.name: Luke 6:12
verses.text: And it came to pass in those days, that he went out into a mountain to pray, and continued all night in prayer to God.

verses.name: Luke 6:13
verses.text: And when it was day, he called unto him his disciples: and of them he chose twelve, whom also he named apostles;
